titleStmt.title: England in its condition, briefly and most lively characterized, by way of essay VVhereunto are annexed some acrosticke verses, vpon the names of severall members of the honourable House of Commons, and others, (viz.) Sir Tho. Fairfax. ...Iohn Wastell, Esquire. By Iohn Benson, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Benson, John, gent.

notesStmt.note: To the reader signed: I. B. i.e. John Benson.
With a list of 25 names in three columns on the title page.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
